name: 0Enhanced4
description: A pixel sorting effect that applies visual manipulation strictly within a segmented area, allowing for precise and isolated transformations.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Sets the minimum brightness value for pixels to be considered for sorting.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Sets the maximum brightness value for pixels to be considered for sorting.
paramDescriptions.angle: Rotates the segmented area by the specified angle before sorting.
paramDescriptions.contrast: Adjusts the contrast of the processed pixels.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Adjusts the saturation of the processed pixels.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Defines how much to downscale for processing; higher values increase efficiency.
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Defines the amount of noise to add.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Adjusts the scale/intensity of added noise.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Specifies the direction to sort pixels within the mask.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Defines how pixels are sorted (Hue, Saturation, or Lightness).
